channel.title: MoparScape 3.1 error (kubuntu dapper)
channel.description: [code]root@kubuntu:/home/justin/moparscape# sh run.sh Exception in thread "main" java.awt.HeadlessException: No X11 DISPLAY variable was set, but this program performed an operation which requires it. at java.applet.Applet.<init>(Applet.java:44) at Applet_Sub1.<init>(Applet_Sub1.java:525) at client.<init>(client.java:12303) at Bot.<init>(Bot.java:123) at Bot.main(Bot.java:116) root@kubuntu:/home/justin/moparscape# [/code] Help anyone? :|

item.title: MoparScape 3.1 error (kubuntu dapper)
item.dc:creator: @Noob_user Noob user
item.description:
@Noob_user wrote:

your molecular interput root/< isnt connected to the ip of the nasa space pod

root@kubuntu:/home/justin/moparscape# sh run.sh Exception in thread "main" java.awt.HeadlessException: No X11 DISPLAY variable was set, but this program performed an operation which requires it. at java.applet.Applet.<init>(Applet.java:44) at Applet_Sub1.<init>(Applet_Sub1.java:525) at client.<init>(client.java:12303) at Bot.<init>(Bot.java:123) at Bot.main(Bot.java:116) root@kubuntu:/home/justin/moparscape#
